scripts.build:vercel: npm run prisma:generate:vercel && npm run build:check-env && next build
scripts.build:check-env: node -e "console.log('Checking environment variables...'); console.log('AUTH_DATABASE_URL:', process.env.AUTH_DATABASE_URL ? 'SET' : 'MISSING'); console.log('HR_DATABASE_URL:', process.env.HR_DATABASE_URL ? 'SET' : 'MISSING'); console.log('PAYROLL_DATABASE_URL:', process.env.PAYROLL_DATABASE_URL ? 'SET' : 'MISSING');"
scripts.prisma:generate: npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/auth.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/hr.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/payroll.prisma
scripts.prisma:generate:vercel: PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS=rhel-openssl-3.0.x npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/auth.prisma && PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS=rhel-openssl-3.0.x npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/hr.prisma && PRISMA_CLI_BINARY_TARGETS=rhel-openssl-3.0.x npx prisma generate --schema=prisma/payroll.prisma
